verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Isn't He wonderful,
wonderful, wonderful
Isn't Jesus our Lord wonderful.
Eyes have seen,
ears have heard
it's recorded in God's word,
Isn't Jesus our Lord wonderful.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord You are wonderful,
wonderful, wonderful,
Oh Lord you are so wonderful.
Eyes have seen, ears have hard,
It's by Your spoken word,
Oh Lord you are so wonderful.
